name: Pacific Air Flight School
about: Pacific Air Flight School, located at the AeroPlex complex in Long Beach, CA, offers superior flight training for aspiring pilots. Our career pilot program is designed to adapt and improve instruction to guarantee student success, with personalized 1-on-1 flight and ground lessons tailored to each student's schedule. Training in one of the busiest and most scenic areas in the country, students benefit from consistent good weather and diverse flying experiences. We emphasize community learning, critical thinking, and industry-standard procedures, using both traditional and advanced G1000 glass cockpit systems. With a commitment to individualized attention and a proven track record of placing students in airline pilot jobs, Pacific Air Flight School creates a safe and stimulating learning environment to prepare students for a successful aviation career.
